summary: Comprehensive testing of Warm Wishes shelter discovery app completed successfully. All core features working perfectly including real-time shelter search via OpenStreetMap/Overpass API, volunteer form submission, donation section, and responsive design.
passed_tests: Organizations endpoint returns 4 organizations with all required fields
Shelter search returns real OpenStreetMap data (2030+ shelters for NYC, 2058 for Chicago)
Shelter search with filters working correctly
Volunteer form submission with proper validation
Homepage loads with winter theme and snowfall effect
Search results page with Leaflet map integration
All filter functionality (pet-friendly, meals, showers, healthcare)
Donation section displays 4 organizations with working links
Real-time shelter data integration via Overpass API
